column4: Hey [COLOR]QUEST_TYPE[!COLOR] [COLOR]QUEST_AMOUNT[!COLOR] [COLOR]QUEST_OBJECT[!COLOR] for me. I'll transfer you [COLOR]$QUEST_REWARD![!COLOR]
Aight sure. Better have my money ready when I'm done.
Ay yo I knew I could count on you bro.
Sheesh great job! Here's your money.
Thanks. U a bro for sure.
You're almost halfway there! Keep it up!
Your duty in Los Santos is to become the most respected homie on the block.
You can earn [COLOR]RESPECT[!COLOR] and [COLOR]CASH[!COLOR] by completing quests or killing enemies.
Use the [COLOR]CASH[!COLOR] you earned to buy new weapons and upgrade your stats.
The [GREEN]green[!GREEN] marker beside you points to the [COLOR]GUN SHOP[!COLOR] where you can buy weapons.
The [RED]red[!RED] marker beside you points to the [COLOR]HOSPITAL[!COLOR] where you can upgrade yourself.
Have fun and remember#RESPECT is EVERYTHING!
